    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_97198</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Currents in a parallel circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ströme in einem parallelen Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courants dans un circuit parallèle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Correntes em um circuito paralelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Correnti in un circuito parallelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρεύματα σε ένα παράλληλο κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corrientes en un circuito paralelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This circuit diagram shows that the total current flowing through each bulb in a parallel circuit is equal to the current from the supply.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammeter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current supply</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulbs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parallel circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Schaltplan zeigt, daß der Gesamtstrom, 
der jede Birne in einem parallelen Stromkreis durchfließt, dem Strom 
vom Zubehör gleich ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce schéma de circuit prouve que tout le courant 
traversant chaque ampoule dans un circuit parallèle est égal au 
courant de l'approvisionnement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de circuito mostra que a corrente 
total que corre através de cada bulbo em um circuito paralelo é 
igual à corrente da fonte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema circuitale indica che la corrente 
totale che attraversa ogni lampadina in un circuito parallelo è 
uguale alla corrente dal rifornimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων δείχνει ότι η συνολική 
παρούσα ροή κάθε βολβού σε ένα παράλληλο κύκλωμα είναι ίση με
το ρεύμα από τον ανεφοδιασμό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este esquema circular muestra que la corriente 
total que atraviesa cada bulbo en un circuito paralelo es igual a la 
corriente de la fuente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amperemeter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktueller Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
